comments.body: Where is it documented to snippet authors that if they use the "stateful_widget" template, how to structure their snippet so as to use the "description", "code-preamble", and "code" blocks?

Currently, it's not.  I'll add a README.md to the templates folder for now. Eventually I'll have a wiki, probably.

FYI, The templates still need work.  The `stateful_widget` template works for this one example that I've used it on, but it's not really flexible enough yet.  I'm going to wait for later PRs to make them better, and add more.
